title: Perplexity AI — AI Tool Review
description: Perplexity AI is an AI-powered answer engine that provides accurate, cited responses to questions by searching the web in real time. Perplexity AI is an AI search engine that combines the power of large language models with real-time web search. Unlike chatbots that rely on training data, Perplexity searches the internet for each query and provides cited, up-to-date answers. It's become a popular alternative to Google for research questions, offering source links for fact verification. Highlights: Real-time web search with citations. No hallucinations — sources provided. Free to use. Academic search mode. Summarizes complex topics clearly.
